video.title: Californication
video.synopsis: A novelist battles writer's block and a weakness for drugs, booze and sex while struggling to make things work with his girlfriend and daughter.

episodes.synopsis: Hank Moody wrestles with writer's block and a lust for women. But his problems escalate when his daughter starts to have sex issues of her own.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Hank accepts his ex-girlfriend's invite to a dinner party. The evening becomes even more awkward when Hank and his date are found fornicating.
episodes.title: Hell-A Woman

episodes.synopsis: Hank brawls with the movie director whom Hank blames for butchering his book. Meanwhile, Hank's agent learns a secret about his sexy assistant, Dani.
episodes.title: The Whore of Babylon

episodes.synopsis: Hank attends Charlie's fundraiser for the environment and learns one of his dirty little secrets. Meanwhile, Karen is impressed by Hank's support.
episodes.title: Fear and Loathing at the Fundraiser

episodes.synopsis: Hank clashes with Meredith about linguistic integrity. Meanwhile, Becca has a crush on her guitar teacher, and Hank agrees to gab about his career.
episodes.title: LOL

episodes.synopsis: After Becca wows the crowd at a concert, a tipsy Hank and Karen make romantic music together. Meanwhile, Charlie reveals a sexual fetish to his wife.
episodes.title: Absinthe Makes the Heart Grow Fonder

episodes.synopsis: Charlie's dream of a threesome between himself, his wife and his assistant becomes a nightmare. And Hank's domestic bliss with Karen is cut short.
episodes.title: Girls Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: Hank numbs the pain of his father's passing with sex, drugs and booze. Karen does her best to comfort Hank and help him overcome his emotional pain.
episodes.title: California Son

episodes.synopsis: Hank returns from his father's funeral and his new spending spree brings unexpected consequences. And Marcy shocks Charlie with a big announcement.
episodes.title: Filthy Lucre

episodes.synopsis: An encounter with a woman at the health club ends up in a threesome at Hank's place. But two visitors turn the erotic encounter into a family fiasco.
episodes.title: The Devil's Threesome

episodes.synopsis: Underage Mia steals Hank's manuscript and pawns it off, blackmailing him to keep quiet or else she'll go public with their illegal one-nighter.
episodes.title: Turn the Page

episodes.synopsis: Hank struggles over Karen and Bill's impending wedding. But it's nothing compared to his struggle in handling his daughter Becca's first period.
episodes.title: The Last Waltz

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Karen decide to pack up and head to New York. As part of the reconciliation, Hank undergoes a grueling vasectomy at Karen's request.
episodes.title: Slip of the Tongue

episodes.synopsis: Hank finds himself in jail after assaulting a mouthy police officer. Still upset at Hank for his accident at the party, Karen refuses to bail him out.
episodes.title: The Great Ashby

episodes.synopsis: On Hank's first day as biographer to Lew Ashby, he's reintroduced to Trixie, the hooker with a heart of gold, who stirs up trouble.
episodes.title: No Way to Treat a Lady

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Karen throw a dinner party for a few close friends: Charlie and Marcy, who show up high, Ashby, Sonja, Julian and Mia.
episodes.title: The Raw & the Cooked

episodes.synopsis: After getting dumped by Karen, Hank is relegated to living at Ashby's mansion. To distract Hank, Ashby arranges a sex session with a celebrity chef.
episodes.title: Vaginatown

episodes.synopsis: Hank decides to seek out Lew Ashby's long lost love. He finds her in the surprising form of Beverly Hills mom Janie Jones.
episodes.title: Coke Dick & First Kick

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Karen attend a parent-teacher conference at Becca's high school. Hank hits it off with the English teacher, Mrs. Patterson.
episodes.title: In a Lonely Place

episodes.synopsis: Hank spends the day at the home of Janie Jones trying to get the back story on her relationship with Lew Ashby.
episodes.title: Going Down and Out in Beverly Hills

episodes.synopsis: Hank meets Janie at an art gallery, where they bump into a very pregnant Sonja and Julian. After a quick escape, Janie invites Hank back to her place.
episodes.title: La Ronde

episodes.synopsis: While Hank nervously awaits the results of his biopsy, he reflects on his relationship with Karen, and we go back to the start of their stormy union.
episodes.title: In Utero

episodes.synopsis: To celebrate the release of Mia's book, Ashby hosts a soirée at the manor. At the party, Karen reveals to Hank that she hasn't read Mia's book.
episodes.title: Blues from Laurel Canyon

episodes.synopsis: Hank completes his biography of Lew Ashby. Mia departs Los Angeles for her cross-country book tour. Sonja gives birth to a baby.
episodes.title: La Petite Mort

episodes.synopsis: Hank struggles to fulfill his duties as a now-single father to the increasingly rebellious Becca, who brings him into the orbit of an academic circle.
episodes.title: Wish You Were Here

episodes.synopsis: Newly anointed (and decidedly reluctant) professor Hank grapples with teaching an undergrad creative writing course.
episodes.title: The Land of Rape and Honey

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Becca attend the annual English department fall mixer hosted by Dean Koons and Felicia.
episodes.title: Verities & Balderdash

episodes.synopsis: Becca drags Hank to a trendy shopping boutique to pick out some more grown-up attire.
episodes.title: Zoso

episodes.synopsis: Hank has the apartment all to his bad self when Becca visits Karen in New York for the weekend.
episodes.title: Slow Happy Boys

episodes.synopsis: Back in Los Angeles for a short visit, Karen hatches a plan to move the family back to New York for good.
episodes.title: Glass Houses

episodes.synopsis: Eager to set things right with Karen again, Hank tries to distance himself from the ladies of the university.
episodes.title: So Here's the Thing

episodes.synopsis: Hank's in for a hedonistic night to remember when Jackie and two stripper friends arrive at his doorstep, unannounced.
episodes.title: The Apartment

episodes.synopsis: After Becca and Chelsea get into a brawl at school, Hank and Karen are called into the principal's office, along with Felicia and Dean.
episodes.title: Mr. Bad Example

episodes.synopsis: Hank takes Charlie out to drown his sorrows after Sue Collini fires him for causing client Rick Springfield to leave the agency.
episodes.title: Dogtown

episodes.synopsis: Karen drags Hank to an end-of-the-semester goodbye luncheon at Felicia's, and Hank realizes he's walked into a hornet's nest.
episodes.title: Comings & Goings

episodes.synopsis: As the Moodys at last prepare to move to New York, Becca tells Hank about an intimate coming-of-age experience she had.
episodes.title: Mia Culpa

episodes.synopsis: Hank is bailed out of jail to find that his literary sex scandal has made him the toast of Hollywood and the target of a lawsuit.
episodes.title: Exile on Main St

episodes.synopsis: Hank polishes off the day with a meeting about his potential new movie that ends with him hiding in a starlet's bathroom and accidentally overdosing.
episodes.title: Suicide Solution

episodes.synopsis: Hank takes advantage of the misperception that he tried to commit suicide and moves back home with Karen and Becca.
episodes.title: Home Sweet Home

episodes.synopsis: A meeting to discuss Hank's recently completed movie script ends with a billionaire dead in a bathroom. Marcy suspects that she might be pregnant.
episodes.title: Monkey Business

episodes.synopsis: After a personal grooming mishap, Charlie discovers that his vasectomy was botched and that Marcy's baby could be his.
episodes.title: Freeze-Frame

episodes.synopsis: A sensational photo derails Hank's case and threatens to destroy his movie project, until his sincere love for Becca rescues his career.
episodes.title: Lawyers, Guns and Money

episodes.synopsis: Forced by her relationship with Hank to recuse herself as his lawyer, Abby pitches the case to a senior partner on the golf course.
episodes.title: The Recused

episodes.synopsis: Hank takes a gig rewriting dialogue on a zombie sequel but threatens his job when he hooks up with a woman with close ties to the film's female lead.
episodes.title: Lights. Camera. A**hole

episodes.synopsis: Evicted from his apartment, Hank moves back in with Karen and Becca while he prepares for his trial and teaches his daughter to drive.
episodes.title: Another Perfect Day

episodes.synopsis: A nervous Hank discovers that he's got good reason to panic when his trial turns into an all-out character assassination.
episodes.title: The Trial

episodes.synopsis: Found guilty of statutory rape, Hank considers fleeing from Los Angeles, but instead enjoys one last night in the company of his friends and family.
episodes.title: The Last Supper

episodes.synopsis: As Hank awaits sentencing, the lines between his real life and the movie based on his life blur as the film's star hits on his ex-wife.
episodes.title: ...And Justice for All

episodes.synopsis: Now living in New York, Hank's looking to get out of town. So when Charlie calls with a potential job on the Left Coast, he boards a plane to LAX.
episodes.title: JFK to LAX

episodes.synopsis: Hank tries to pass on penning the screenplay for hip-hop artist Samurai Apocalypse's latest feature. But Sam won't take no for an answer.
episodes.title: The Way Of The Fist

episodes.synopsis: Hank gives Sam a completed draft of Santa Monica Cop, but his attempts to leave town are thwarted (again) when he's asked to show Kali around.
episodes.title: Boys & Girls

episodes.synopsis: When Karen and Becca show up to invite Hank to a dinner party, he has no choice but to bring his ex-girlfriend Carrie along.
episodes.title: Waiting For The Miracle

episodes.synopsis: Samurai Apocalypse invites a giddy Hank and Charlie on a ride-along with the Santa Monica Police Department to research his latest film role.
episodes.title: The Ride-Along

episodes.synopsis: When Samurai Apocalypse hits a lyrical roadblock with his protégé, he calls on Hank, the best scribe he knows.
episodes.title: Love Song

episodes.synopsis: It's just like old times for Karen and Hank until Richard Bates shows up drunk after a binge and Hank has to pick up the pieces.
episodes.title: Here I Go Again

episodes.synopsis: Hank gets stuck with the unpleasant task of reading Tyler's screenplay. But it's even more unfortunate that the screenplay references Becca.
episodes.title: Raw

episodes.synopsis: On the first day of production for Santa Monica Cop, Hank's rendezvous with the film's leading lady puts his relationship with Sam in jeopardy.
episodes.title: At the Movies

episodes.synopsis: Down an agent and best friend, Hank finds reason to crash with Karen and Becca and seeks new representation with Hollywood power agent Larry Levine.
episodes.title: Perverts & Whores

episodes.synopsis: After overstaying his welcome at Karen's, Hank's ready to hit the road. But not before Lizzie lures him back to a surprise party at Charlie's.
episodes.title: The Party

episodes.synopsis: In a dreamlike haze, Hank hits the local watering hole, visits the set of Santa Monica Cop and tells Karen that he loves her.
episodes.title: Hell Ain't a Bad Place to Be

episodes.synopsis: Hank might have survived a murder-suicide attempt by his lovelorn East Coast ex, Carrie, but she's still haunting his dreams.
episodes.title: The Unforgiven

episodes.synopsis: Hank reluctantly heeds the advice of family and friends and heads to rehab. But a fellow patient might be his light at the end of the tunnel.
episodes.title: Quitters

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Faith attend a funeral; Karen finds Hank in a compromising position; and Robbie Mac and Ken take Charlie out on the town.
episodes.title: Dead Rock Stars

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Charlie meet with Robbie Mac, but the project is a little out of Hank's wheelhouse. Marcy, Ophelia and Karen commiserate over dinner.
episodes.title: Hell Bent For Leather

episodes.synopsis: Ken discovers Charlie's secret; Atticus Fetch sends Hank and Charlie on a hunt; and Marcy makes a decision about Stu.
episodes.title: Rock And A Hard Place

episodes.synopsis: The boys board Air Force 69 with Atticus Fetch to present the songs for the Broadway adaptation of A Crazy Little Thing Called Love in New York City.
episodes.title: In The Clouds

episodes.synopsis: Hank returns to find Becca in need of help. But his plan for her backfires when they visit Atticus Fetch and his house guest, Marilyn Manson.
episodes.title: The Dope Show

episodes.synopsis: The reviews are in for the first draft of "A Crazy Little Thing Called Love: The Musical." Becca contemplates alternate careers.
episodes.title: Everybody's A F**Cking Critic

episodes.synopsis: When Atticus throws a party, Faith provides the girls, the Dealer provides the recreation and Hank's old friend provides the entertainment.
episodes.title: Mad Dogs And Englishmen

episodes.synopsis: Hank seeks comfort from Faith, only to find her with Beckett. On the home front, Becca has some big news.
episodes.title: Blind Faith

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Faith join forces to track down Atticus, but Becca is the only person who can really help. Marcy's outing with Ophelia leaves her tied up.
episodes.title: The Abby

episodes.synopsis: Hank makes a big decision about his future. But a call from Becca and a visit from a dearly departed friend set him in motion.
episodes.title: I'll Lay My Monsters Down

episodes.synopsis: Hank gets hired as a writer on the show "Santa Monica Cop," and a reporter named Levon asks to interview Hank for his college paper.
episodes.title: Levon

episodes.synopsis: Hank's first day in the writer's room is filled with aggravation, and a visit to Levon's apartment results in a surprise.
episodes.title: Julia

episodes.synopsis: Hank has to save his relationship with Karen while helping Levon land a job as a production assistant, which brings unexpected complications.
episodes.title: Like Father Like Son

episodes.synopsis: Julia lands a role on "Santa Monica Cop," Levon wants to sleep with Melanie, and Charlie wants to be Goldie's new manager.
episodes.title: Dicks

episodes.synopsis: Levon has the best night of his life with Nikki, while Karen, Hank and Marcy are forced to endure the company of Nikki's creepy friend.
episodes.title: Getting the Poison Out

episodes.synopsis: Rath throws a "Santa Monica Cop" kickoff party where Hank has an intimate notes session with the show's female lead while the male lead hits on Julia.
episodes.title: Kickoff

episodes.synopsis: Rath demands a rewrite of Hank's script and Julia's boss, Dr. Dan, gives her career advice with which Hank and Levon disagree.
episodes.title: Smile

episodes.synopsis: During the filming of Hank's episode, he has problems with Hashtag Black, Julia proves distracting and Levon gets a big opportunity.
episodes.title: 30 Minutes or Less

episodes.synopsis: After finding out that Karen has been in a car accident, Hank remembers turbulent times in their relationship, as well as a happier Charlie and Marcy.
episodes.title: Faith, Hope, Love

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Karen's romantic dinner gets interrupted by first Julia, then Charlie, Marcy, Levon and others.
episodes.title: Dinner with Friends

episodes.synopsis: When the ratings come in for "Santa Monica Cop," Hank may be out of a job, and Karen's family reunion plans are spoiled by Levon.
episodes.title: Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Hank still struggles with his feelings about Becca's wedding plans but finally makes the choice between Julia and Karen.
episodes.title: Grace
